## Problem 6

```{r, echo=TRUE}
fib_sum = function(n) {
  if(n == 0) {
    return(0)
  } 
  if(n == 1) {
    return(1)
  }
  return(fib_sum(n-1) + fib_sum(n-2) + 1)
}
fib_sum(20)
```
